Description: Reed spindle, without whorl and broken at both ends, with a large quantity of fine spun cotton yarn wound round it, some unspun cotton fibre still attached.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), House B12 (Bosnian) Room 124 Floor 1 upper fill
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
